# UIPrinter.CutterBehavior.cutAfterEachPage

**Case**

Cut the paper after each page.

## Declaration

```swift
case cutAfterEachPage
```

## Constants

- **UIPrinter.CutterBehavior.noCut**: Don’t cut the paper.
- **UIPrinter.CutterBehavior.printerDefault**: Use the printer’s default behavior.
- **UIPrinter.CutterBehavior.cutAfterEachCopy**: Cut the paper after each copy of the document.
- **UIPrinter.CutterBehavior.cutAfterEachJob**: Cut the paper after each print job finishes.
